name: sProphet
overview:
sProphet is a social gaming platform that offers users a new way to share, participate and make predictions about real sports events.

At sProphet users gets virtual play money (sProphet Dollars & sProphet Golden Coins) to challenge friends, arrange group predictions or just to try to take the house down, this can be done with sProphet unique system that enables the user to predict outcome of 15 different sports types and over 80 leagues.

With their sDollars (“sProphet Dollars”) users can get virtual gifts or send Gifts to their buddies, move froward in the game (which open more game options) and win real prizes by participating in sProphet Missions.
